QuestData.Title: The High Cultist
QuestData.Description: I have dreamed of Zangus before but without the context that you have discovered, I knew not what it meant. You have brought clarity to the vision that the goddess has bestowed upon me, and now I know that he can be found within the Pit of Narjun to the north.$B$BYou know your target, $n. If there's to be an end to the suffering of the land, the high cultist must die!
QuestData.LogDescription: Warden Jodi Moonsong at Stars' Rest has asked you to slay High Cultist Zangus.
QuestData.CompletionText: I sense that High Cultist Zangus yet lives.$B$BIs there something wrong, $n? Perhaps you need to rest first?
QuestData.RewardText: With the high cultist destroyed, the rest of his forces can be mopped up and the land and its creatures will recover.$B$BThank you, $n. May the goddess illuminate your path.
